article_title: Free tax-prep site depends on its volunteers

article_metadata.description: As the 2016 income tax season enters its home stretch, business is a little slow at the Center for Economic Progress free tax-preparation site at Springfield's Family Service Center.“We had three clients last night,” site manager John Loftus said Wednesday. “But this is the slow time. At the start of the tax season, we’ll have 40 people a day. Now we’re lucky to get 20.”But on Wednesday night, the number of clients is picking up, and volunteers begin to
article_metadata.author: Chris Dettro
